name: DRYAD: Dawn of Humankind
description:
Dryad: Dawn of Humankind is a 3D adventure game with platformer elements that takes place on a collapsed Earth. In a world where the planet was getting close to a dead-end, a factory appears in the middle of the biggest - and one of the only places untouched by humanity - tropical forest on the planet. That was the last straw as the collapse accelerates and the Earth quickly succumbs.

After some time, mother nature makes her last effort to reverse this situation: using her last force, she makes the last flower and, inside of it, the last Dryad is born. Now, this tiny creature has the mission to destroy the factory and reestablish nature’s dominance.
